headline: S&P 500 Stocks: Screening For Long-Term Winners, My List Of 13

headline: Merck: Don't Let Today's Bargain Opportunity Pass You By
summary: Merck remains a top Big Pharma name with strong leadership, rising sales, and high margins, despite regulatory fears and pressures. Learn why MRK stock is a buy.
